validation.validation_message: Clone width must be between 1-2048

Gamma Correction must be 0.6 to 6. Gamma is 1.0 or no correction by default.

Gamma Correction must be 0.6 to 6. Gamma is 1.0 or no correction by default.
Brightness Correction must be 0 to 200. The default value is 100. Anything less is negative correction. Anything more is positive correction.
Contrast Correction must be 0 to 200. The default value is 100. Anything less is negative correction. Anything more is positive correction.
Saturation Correction must be 0 to 200. The default value is 100. Anything less is negative correction. Anything more is positive correction.
A readable port name must be entered that is between 1 and 12 characters.

Reference Frequency is between 190000 and 210000.
At least one device must be selected.
The same attribute IDs may only be selected once.
Selected custom attributes need an ID and value.

control.control_title: T1- VDD active and sDVO clock/data active

validation.validation_message: VDD Active. 0-4095. Increment of 1. Default = 255.

control.control_title: T2- sDVO clock/data active and backlight enable

validation.validation_message: Backlight Active. 0-4095. Increment of 2. Default = 127.

control.control_title: T3- Backlight disable and sDVO clock/data inactive

validation.validation_message: Backlight Inactive. 0-4095. Increment of 2. Default = 127.

control.control_title: T4- sDVO clock/data inactive and VDD inactive

validation.validation_message: VDD Inactive. 0-4095. Increment of 1. Default = 255.

control.control_title: T5- Minimum from VDD inactive and active

validation.validation_message: VDD Active to Inactive must be a valid integer.
Enter Device Address Byte, minimum value is 0x00, maximum value is 0xFF.
I2C Speed. Enter an integer. Range [10-400].
Enter Device Address Byte, minimum value is 0x00, maximum value is 0xFF.
DDC Speed. Enter an integer. Range [10-400].
When Fixed Timing is enabled, EMGD will output only a single native DTD to the display device.
At least one Custom DTD must be defined and selected
A DTD name must be entered that is between 1 and 50 characters

control.control_title: Horizontal Sync Offset (Front Porch) in pixels

validation.validation_message: Horizontal Sync Offset. Enter an integer. Range 0-8191 [13 bits].

control.control_title: Horizontal Sync Pulse Width (Sync Time) in pixels

validation.validation_message: Horizontal Sync Pulse Width. Enter an integer. Range 0-8191 [13 bits].

control.control_title: Horizontal Blank Width (Blank Time) in pixels

validation.validation_message: Horizontal Blank Width. Enter an integer. Range 0-32767 [15 bits].
Horizontal Active. Enter an integer. Range 1-32767 [15 bits].
Horizontal Sync Start. Enter an integer. Range 0-40957.
Horizontal Sync End. Enter an integer. Range 0-49148.
Horizontal Blank End. Enter an integer. Range 0-65533.
Horizontal Back Porch. Enter an integer. Range 0-32766.
Pixel Clock. Enter an integer (kHz).
Refresh. Enter an integer (Hz).

control.control_title: Vertical Sync Offset (Front Porch) in lines

validation.validation_message: Vertical Sync Offset. Enter an integer. Range 0-63 [6 bits].

validation.validation_message: Vertical Sync Pulse Width. Enter an integer. Range 0-63 [6 bits].

control.control_title: Vertical Blank Width (Blank Time) in lines

validation.validation_message: Vertical Blank Width. Enter an integer. Range 0-4095 [12 bits].
Vertical Active. Enter an integer. Range 1-4095 [12 bits].
Vertical Sync Start. Enter an integer. Range 0-4157.
Vertical Sync End. Enter an integer. Range 0-4220.
Vertical Blank End. Enter an integer. Range 0-8189.
Vertical Back Porch. Enter an integer. Range 0-4094.

control.control_title: Mode Line is in the format: name I A B C D E F G H

validation.validation_message: I. Enter the dot clock value.
A. Range 0-32767 [15 bits].
B. Range 0-40958.
C. Range 0-40958.
D. Range 0-65534.
E. Range 0-4095 [12 bits].
F. Range 0-4158.
G. Range 0-4158.
H. Range 0-8190.

control.control_title: EDID Block is in the format: a0 0f 20 00 31 58 1c 20 d2 1a 14 -- -- -- -- -- -- 1c

validation.validation_message: Edid block entry byte 18 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 11 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 10 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 9 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 8 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 7 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 6 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 5 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 4 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 3 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 2 must be between 0 and FF.
Edid block entry byte 1 must be between 0 and FF.

OEM Product Name must be between 1 and 50 characters

Default Mode Settings must be a hexadecimal. Default mode number is 0x03

Minimum Video Surface Height must be between 0x1 and 0xFFFFFFF
